item.title: How do i make npc give u items wen u talk to them?
item.dc:creator: @kapokliukaz kapokliukaz
item.description:
@kapokliukaz wrote:

how do i make it so u can chose out of 2 items?

so change the dialog case 9158:
}else if (NpcDialogue == 1566){ NpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = true; addItem(6107, 1); addItem(6108, 1); addItem(3753, 1); addItem(4587, 1); addItem(3061, 1); RemoveAllWindows();
and u can chose from 2 options
example
rename “yes” and “no” to “dragon” and barrows"
and change cases
